story_10_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Well, team, it’s been a pretty eventful journey
so far, but I think I’m ready to get back to
collecting badges.
story_10_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
The only one we’re missing now is the
Pride Badge. Once we get our hands on that,
we’ll be able to compete in the PML!
story_10_01000/2401_0301_0300_10:
Can’t wait to meet the next
PML Leader!
story_10_01000/2401_0401_0400_10:
Hahaha! You really do love Pokémon battles,
don’t you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_10_01000/2401_0302_0500_10: It’s been pretty challenging so far.
story_10_01000/2401_0402_0600_10:
It sure has...but we’re in the final stretch now!
Come on—let’s give this our best shot!
story_10_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Do you know anything about the PML Leader
we’re looking for?
story_10_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: From what I hear, she’s still a young child.
story_10_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
But supposedly, she’s got some serious talent,
despite her age. Rumor has it she’s a kahuna
on one of the Alolan islands...
story_10_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Aha! Interesting... I wonder if she’s a little
like me, then! It sounds like she could be!
story_10_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Maybe we’ll end up being super good friends!
Come on, hurry up! What are we waiting for?!
